alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 09 at 3:43PM AKST until March 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will increase this evening, with the strongest winds Thursday.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
